featured.text: It is said that in ancient times a man would place a drop of blood between his wife’s eyes to seal their marriage.
Once used, the bags are sealed and stored for the flight back to the earth, _(25)_

definition.zh_def: 海豹，一種生活在海洋中的哺乳動物，通常有流線型的身體和厚厚的皮毛。
definition.en_def: A marine mammal with a streamlined body and thick fur, often found in cold waters.
definition.example: The seal basked on the rocky shore, enjoying the warm sun.
